Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Peg Morthorst
Reviews.Content: I got this for my bedroom.  I am happy with it.  it has a clear sharp picture and the sound quality is good.  I would recommend this TV,

Reviews.Title: You will not regret this buy
Reviews.Author: Barbara Lachance
Reviews.Content: I received a 39" Haier for a aniversary gift from my place of employment and love it so much I decided it was time to ungrade the TV's in both my bedrooms, I like everything about it, I would recommend them highly

ProductInfo.Name: Haier 24-Inch 720p 60Hz  LED HDTV (LE24C3320)
